item.title: 扎克伯格加倍致力于人工智能，Meta 投资者欢呼雀跃
item.description: Meta Platforms 公司不断开出更大的支票，以实现其人工智能战略，而交易员们也不断为其欢呼雀跃，相信昂贵的赌注会不断得到回报。【原文：Meta Platforms Inc. keeps writing bigger checks in pursuit of its artificial intelligence strategy, and traders keep cheering it on, encouraged that the expensive bets will keep paying off.】

item.title: 加拿大皇家银行称，高通胀情况下美股有下跌 20% 的风险
item.description: 加拿大皇家银行资本市场公司（RBC Capital Markets LLC）的策略师在一份报告中指出，如果油价上涨导致通胀飙升，那么 S&P 500 指数有可能下挫 20%。【原文：The S&P 500 Index risks sinking 20% if inflation spikes on the back of higher oil prices, according to a report by RBC Capital Markets LLC strategists that laid out three possible pullbacks.】

item.title: 冲突加剧，石油运输商暂停中东报价
item.description: 一些油轮船东和管理者评估了以色列与伊朗冲突带来的风险，因此自上周五起暂停提供前往中东航线的船只，这加剧了人们对该地区出口流量的担忧。【原文：Some oil tanker owners and managers have paused offering their vessels for Middle Eastern routes since Friday as they assess the risks from Israel’s conflict with Iran, fueling concerns over export flows from the region.】

item.title: 印度央行就债务大跌后的借贷成本征求市场意见
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，印度央行已经非正式地联系了一些债券交易商，以了解短期借贷成本达到什么水平会让市场感到舒服。【原文：India’s central bank has informally contacted some bond traders to gauge what level of short-term borrowing costs would be comfortable to the market, according to people familiar with the matter, following a selloff sparked by concerns of liquidity withdrawal.】

item.title: 大科技股的狂飙迫使期权专业人士准备套期保值
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）于 4 月 2 日颁布全面关税法令后，美国股市一蹶不振，大型科技公司引领了美股的强劲反弹。现在，期权交易员们发出信号，他们认为这个高价股尤其容易受到贸易战引发的新一轮波动的影响。【原文：Big Tech has led the furious rebound in US stocks from the tailspin that followed President Donald Trump’s sweeping April 2 tariff edict. Now options traders are signaling that they see the pricey cohort as especially vulnerable to another round of trade war-driven volatility.】

item.description: 空中客车公司（Airbus SE）获得沙特阿拉伯出租商 Avilease 多达 77 架飞机的订单，拉开了巴黎航展交易的序幕。【原文：Airbus SE landed an order for as many as 77 aircraft from Saudi Arabian lessor Avilease, kicking off dealmaking at the Paris Air Show.】

item.title: 全球经济持续紧张，印度五月贸易逆差仍在缩小
item.description: 印度 5 月份的贸易逆差有所收窄，尽管全球供应链仍然受到美国全面关税的压力。【原文：India posted a narrower trade deficit in May, even as global supply chains remained under strain from sweeping US tariffs.】

item.title: 苹果公司因应用程序商店限制而面临欧盟新指控的风险
item.description: 如果苹果公司不尽快纠正被指控违反新数字法的行为，就有可能再次遭到欧盟反垄断监督机构的指控，该数字法今年早些时候导致苹果公司被罚款 5 亿欧元（5.79 亿美元）。【原文：Apple Inc. is edging toward another charge sheet from European Union antitrust watchdogs unless it quickly fixes alleged violations of a new digital law that led to a €500 million ($579 million) fine earlier this year.】

item.title: 奇货可居：吉姆-伊根谈美国的巨大房贷缺口（播客）
item.description: 不知何故，美国消费者依然相当强劲。尽管利率提高、关税增加、总体经济不确定等等，人们仍在继续消费。然而，你也可以观察到一些薄弱环节，特别是如果你查看各类信贷的拖欠数据。但即使在这里，模式也并不完全明显，因为它并不能很好地细分优质与非优质借款人。但有一个重要的分界线：您是否拥有 ZIRP 时代的抵押贷款？【原文：Somehow, the American consumer remains quite strong. Despite higher interest rates, tariffs, general economic uncertainty and so forth, people are continuing to spend. And yet there are some pockets of weakness that you can observe, especially if you look at delinquency data for various types of credit. But even here the patterns aren’t totally obvious, as it doesn’t break down nicely among prime vs. non-prime borrowers. But there is one important divide: Do you have a ZIRP-era mortgage or not?】

item.title: TikTok 利用新工具深入开发人工智能生成的视频广告
item.description: TikTok 正在推出一系列由人工智能驱动的新广告功能，其中包括营销人员可以使用文本或静态图像为该服务创建人工智能生成的视频。【原文：TikTok is rolling out a set of new artificial intelligence-powered advertising features, including the ability for marketers to use text or still images to create AI-generated video for the service.】

item.title: 博彩集团上调 BetMGM 指引后，Entain 股价上涨
item.description: Entain Plc 的股价最高上涨了 8%，此前该体育博彩和游戏集团上调了 BetMGM 的全年收入指导，BetMGM 是该集团与美高梅国际酒店集团（MGM Resorts International）在美国的合资企业。【原文：Entain Plc shares rose as much as 8% after the sports betting and gaming group upgraded its full-year revenue guidance for BetMGM, the US-based joint venture it shares with MGM Resorts International.】

item.title: 以色列-伊朗紧张局势引发的国债大跌可能持续下去
item.description: 如果以色列和伊朗之间过去发生的冲突可以作为参考，那么最新一轮以色列-伊朗冲突给 10 年期美国国债带来的抛售压力很可能会产生持久影响。【原文：Selling pressure on 10-year US Treasuries from the latest round of Israel-Iran conflict is likely to have a lasting effect if past episodes of clashes between the two nations are any guide.】

item.title: 伊朗的近炸级铀库存状况困扰着国际原子能机构
item.description: 联合国原子能监察机构正在召开一次紧急会议，评估以色列对伊朗核设施的袭击，以及以色列对伊斯兰共和国储备的近炸弹级铀的监督所造成的破坏。【原文：The United Nations atomic watchdog is convening an emergency meeting to assess Israel’s attacks on Iranian nuclear facilities, along with their disruption on oversight of the Islamic Republic’s stockpile of near-bomb grade uranium.】

item.title: 雷诺股价暴跌，扭亏为盈的首席执行官将前往开云集团工作
item.description: 由于首席执行官卢卡-德梅奥准备离开这家法国汽车制造商，加入开云集团（Kering SA）成为其下一任领导人，雷诺汽车公司（Renault SA）的跌幅创下自 7 月份以来最大。【原文：Renault SA tumbled the most since July as Chief Executive Officer Luca de Meo prepared to leave the French automaker and join Kering SA as its next leader.】

item.title: 澳大利亚财长警告全球经济 "危机四伏
item.description: 澳大利亚财政部长吉姆-查莫斯（Jim Chalmers）周一表示，以色列对伊朗核设施的空袭以及伊斯兰共和国的报复行动对中东来说是一个 "危险 "的时刻，加上其他地区的动荡，意味着全球经济 "现在是一个相当危险的地方"。【原文：Israel’s air strikes on Iran’s nuclear facilities and the Islamic Republic’s retaliation represents a “perilous” moment for the Middle East, and together with turmoil elsewhere means the global economy is a “pretty dangerous place right now,” Australian Treasurer Jim Chalmers said Monday.】

item.title: 纳格尔称欧洲央行既不能承诺暂停也不能承诺降息
item.description: 欧洲央行理事会成员约阿希姆-纳格尔（Joachim Nagel）表示，欧洲央行必须在利率问题上保留充分的选择权，因为经济增长和通胀前景的不确定性依然很高。【原文：The European Central Bank must retain full optionality on interest rates because uncertainty over the growth and inflation outlook remains elevated, according to Governing Council member Joachim Nagel.】

item.title: 比特币买家 Metaplanet 现已超过芯片制造商 Kioxia
item.description: 在全球加密货币大涨的背景下，日本酒店业者变身比特币买家Metaplanet公司的市值在不到两个月的时间里超过了内存芯片制造商Kioxia控股公司，股价飙升近400%。【原文：Japan’s hotelier-turned-Bitcoin-buyer Metaplanet Inc. overtook memory chipmaker Kioxia Holdings Corp. in terms of market capitalization as the stock soared nearly 400% in less than two months, riding the global crypto rally.】

item.title: 波斯湾船舶信号干扰随着冲突扩大而加剧
item.description: 上周末，霍尔木兹海峡和波斯湾 900 多艘船只发出的导航信号出现故障，在伊朗和以色列战事加剧之际，给这个航运咽喉造成了混乱。【原文：Navigation signals from more than 900 vessels in the Strait of Hormuz and the Persian Gulf went awry over the weekend, creating confusion in the shipping chokepoint as the fighting between Iran and Israel intensified.】

item.title: Imax 与万达合作在中国增设屏幕，押宝大片
item.description: 伊美克斯公司（Imax Corp. ）的中国分公司正积极地在全国各地增加银幕，押注于本地和美国的大制作，以提高其在世界第二大电影市场的销售额。【原文：Imax Corp.’s Chinese arm is aggressively adding screens across the country, betting on big local and US productions to boost its sales in the world’s second-largest film market.】

item.title: 中东冲突加剧，欧洲天然气价格上涨
item.description: 由于对中东爆发更大规模战争的担忧继续主导能源市场，欧洲天然气价格涨幅扩大。【原文：European natural gas prices extended gains as fears of a wider war in the Middle East continued to dominate energy markets.】

item.title: 监管机构公布隐藏数据，孟加拉国不良贷款创纪录
item.description: 孟加拉国的银行业陷入困境，因为中央银行发现了前政府以前未披露的数据，现在近四分之一的贷款已经出现问题。【原文：Bangladesh’s banking sector is in distress, as nearly a quarter of all loans have now soured after the central bank unearthed previously undisclosed data from the former government.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长金多斯称通胀超调风险非常有限
item.description: 欧洲央行副行长路易斯-德金多斯（Luis de Guindos）告诉路透社，通胀率低于欧洲央行 2% 目标的威胁已经得到控制。【原文：The threat of inflation falling short of the European Central Bank’s 2% target is contained, Vice President Luis de Guindos told Reuters.】

item.title: 加拿大皇家银行警告：中东危机升级，石油 "在劫难逃
item.description: 据加拿大皇家银行资本市场有限责任公司（RBC Capital Markets LLC）称，随着以色列与伊朗之间的冲突持续发酵，中东地区的石油供应面临着越来越大的风险，该公司警告说，能源现在 "明显处于十字准线上"。【原文：Oil supplies from the Middle East face increasing risk as the conflict between Israel and Iran drags on, according to RBC Capital Markets LLC, which warned that energy is now “clearly in the crosshairs.”】
